name: The Swedish Word Of The Day
author: swedishwordplugin.com

sections.description:
The Swedish Word Of The Day is an educational and fun plugin for WordPress that every day displays a Swedish word and it’s translation into English.

This plugin is provided by swedishwordplugin.com and uses the site to fetch data. Read more at Swedishwordplugin.com.

Swedish Word Plugin Features:

  • One new Swedish word every Day
  • Translations into English
  • Inherit colors and fonts from website
  • Responsive widget

Install the plugin on your WordPress website, activate it and display the Swedish word of the day in widget or in the content using the shortcode [swedish_word]

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
Upload The Swedish Word Of The Day Plugin to your website and activate.

- Add the widget to your sidebar or any widget area or use the shortcode [swedish_word] on your post or page.
- You're done.
